TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Eric_Anderson, title = Eric_Anderson, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eric_Anderson} }

S.FORM: Eric Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1970, ryax sa tay 26 nqu tay 5, Eric Anderson, squliq na p'unro.
